body: So I recently broke my headset (Razer Kraken Pro), I'm buying a new one. So any suggestions?
body_tagged: So I recently broke my headset (Razer Kraken Pro), I'm buying a new one. So any suggestions?
title: Recommendations?

replies.body: I heard astro headsets are extremely comfortable and good quality but are pretty expensive. Btw I have Kraken Pros. Hope mine dont break........
replies.body_tagged: I heard astro headsets are extremely comfortable and good quality but are pretty expensive. Btw I have Kraken Pros. Hope mine dont break........

replies.body: I've had Astro A50's for about two and a half years now, and I would never choose anything different. They do have a somewhat hefty price tag at $300, but if you manage to get some then you will not regret it. They are hands-down one of the best gaming investments I've ever made.
replies.body_tagged: I've had Astro A50's for about two and a half years now, and I would never choose anything different. They do have a somewhat hefty price tag at $300, but if you manage to get some then you will not regret it. They are hands-down one of the best gaming investments I've ever made.

replies.body:
I'm sure its comfortable :P

replies.body: I got a pair for £5 from my local discount store and they are really comfortable and work great.
